name: Learn Arabic Alphabet and numbers For Kids
description: Learning Arabic Alphabet and numbers WOrds for children, totally, fun and 100% free. Learning Arabic Alphabet Arabic numbers WOrds for children APP Teach your kids with fun way. Your kids will learn Alphabets, Numbers,Fruits, Body Parts,Vehicles, School and much more to learn Kids Educational Games contain basic words and education such as : Learning Alphabet / Letters and Writing Alphabet ABC , Learning Numbers 123, Learning Colors, Learning fruits , Learning Animal name , Learning Human body parts name, Learning Seasons name,Learn Days and Months name. There are a lot of topics well and interesting. Kids can practice with good topics and real life. Help kids to learn simple communication sentences. Easy to learn vocabulary through pictures.  Learning Alphabet Arabic and numbers WOrds for kids menus:  - Math for kids , Addition and Subtraction - Learning Human Body Parts in arabic  - Learning Seasons Type in arabic  - Learning School Supplies in arabic  - Learning Fruit with voice in arabic  - Learning vegetables with voice in arabic  - Learning Basic MATH: Numbers in arabic  - Writing Alphabet ABC in arabic with sound - Writing Numbers 123 from 1 to 20 in arabic with sound - Learning Numbers ( read numbers 123 ) in arabic with sound - Learning Letters / Alphabet (read and write letters / alphabet ABC) in arabic  - Learning Colors with voice in arabic  - Learning Shapes with voice in arabic  - Learning Animal name with voice in arabic  - Learning Fruit in arabic  - Learning Vegetables in arabic  - Learning to Write Numbers in arabic  - Learning to Write Alphabets in arabic    Thank you for selecting this app. In the next version we are going to add new features, until then enjoy this free version and please share your views and rate us according to your experience..!! We hope that this app will help you or your child learn fluently.
